{{Description|If you told Mavuika that in another world vehicles like the Flamestrider required license plates for identification, that would make her happy too:<br>"Well, mine's the only one that exists here. Guess that means I get to pick whatever plate number I want, huh?"}}
'''The Named Moment''' is [[Mavuika]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|Skill DMG|5}}
* Ring of Searing Radiance can attack up to '''10''' targets at once. Interactable objects such as [[Dendro Core]]s are also targeted, but have a lower priority than enemies.
* While Mavuika is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state and is riding the Flamestrider, the [[Fall DMG]] Mavuika takes is reduced by '''50%'''. This also stacks additively with the Fall DMG reduction from performing a [[Plunging Attack]], causing her to take no Fall DMG plunging from any height.
* If Nightsoul's Blessing ends while Mavuika is in the middle of a Normal Attack string, the combo count will not reset.
** As Mavuika's converted Normal Attack string consists of 5 hits while her unconverted one only has 4 hits, if Nightsoul's Blessing ends after Mavuika completes her fourth converted Normal Attack, then she will still perform her fourth and final regular Normal Attack next, not her first one.

* Mavuika has additional three separate meters when [[climbing]], traveling over water, and [[gliding]].
** When the meter runs out, regardless of remaining Nightsoul Points, she cannot continue. However, if applicable, she can switch to the other alternatives and use a separate meter from the previous one.
** The climbing, traveling over water, and gliding meters have time limits of 1s, 3s, and 3s, respectively. [["Humanity's Name" Unfettered|Constellation 6]] doubles these time limits.
** All three meters will be refilled when the Flamestrider stands on solid ground. 
** When Mavuika triggers [[Nightsoul Transmission]], the meter of the current action can be refilled by her Elemental Skill button, with a different icon.
